### 7.5.1 Rの場合

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
my_data <- cars
my_result <- train(form = dist ~ speed, data = my_data, method = "lm")
```

```{r}
my_test <- data.frame(speed = 21.5) # 予測対象の準備
```

```{r}
my_result %>% predict(my_test) # 予測対象に対する予測

#>        1 
#> 66.96769 
```

```{r}
f <- function(x) { my_result %>% predict(data.frame(speed = x)) }
f(21.5)

#>        1 
#> 66.96769 
```

```{r}
my_data %>% ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_function(fun = f) # 結果は割愛
```

```{r}
my_data %>% ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(formula = y ~ x, method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```
